channel.title: OOP on akifmt

item.title: What is OOP?
item.description: Object Oriented Programming(OOP) is a programming paradigm based on the concept of objects, which may contain data, in the form of fields, often known as attributes; and code, in the form of procedures, often known as methods. Encapsulation Abstraction Inheritance Polymorphism
